      • setBufferSize

        public void setBufferSize(int bufferSize)
        Set SourceDataLine buffer size. It affects audio latency (the delay between SourceDataLine.write(data) and real sound).
        Parameters:
        bufferSize - if equal to -1 (AudioSystem.NOT_SPECIFIED) means maximum buffer size available.

      • getBufferSize

        public int getBufferSize()
        Return SourceDataLine buffer size.
        Returns:
        -1 (AudioSystem.NOT_SPECIFIED) for maximum buffer size.
